p:
All of these symptoms of overtraining healthy subjects in stress as well as their overall health status are in line with a subpar health status
78 known in TCM as “shanghuo” or “re‐qi” (upper fever, pathology fire, internal heat, or excessive energy associated with energy metabolism), which is characterized by a general decline in health, cut of energy, weakness, impaired physiological functions and adaptability (presumably Xie‐Huo in TCM), leading to the onset and progression of diseases.
79
